where_to_read: IS there any better place to read
title: The Year of the Death of Ricardo Reis
summary:
Considered to be one of Saramego’s greatest novels and winner of the 1998 Nobel Prize in Literature The Year of the Death of Ricardo Reis follows the title characters torment on his return to Lisbon after living in Brazil. Ricardo Reis was one of the pseudonyms used by the great Portuguese writer Fernando Pessoa. 

In this novel, Ricardo Reis meets the ghost of Pessoa and is taken on a philosophcal journey exploring the idea of life and death. Much of the time the reader is given little indication of what is real and what is fantasy along the way but the novel becomes all the more intriguing and compelling  because of this.
story_arc:
Bad luck, followed by promise, ending in a
                    final fall
